name: Delivery-BOT
description:
Me (Igor) and Cesar are studenst in Game Design and Digital Interteinement here in Santa Catariana (South Brazil) and we team up with a couple of friends (Samuel and Valverde) to join this Game Jam to improve our skills and add another game in the portfolio.
Although this is not our first Game Jam, this is the first that we participate in a Global level and we are very happy to be part of it.

Check out our newest game (The Game Page is all in portuguese but the game is in english). https://veludito.itch.io/nobugame
